name: aerosolize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to turn or be turned into an aerosol (= a mixture of extremely small pieces of matter and the liquid or gas that they are contained in, that can spread through the air): Evidence suggests that the coronavirus can aerosolize only under very limited conditions. The study suggests the virus is aerosolized through talking and exhalation.
More examplesFewer examplesAny tool that will aerosolize bacteria into an invisible cloud could be used to weaponize anthrax.The research found no aerosolized coronavirus particles in the hospital rooms of Covid-19 patients.The biological weapons programs of the United States and the Soviet Union developed techniques to aerosolize plague directly, eliminating dependence on the unpredictable flea vector. I don't think he ever intended to kill anybody. He probably had no clue that the agent would aerosolize through envelopes and kill postal workers.
